column4: Hello ...i am running Ubuntu 9.10...  I need to upgrade Thunderbird to 3.0 so it is comptablith with my google calender/blackberry.   Could someone here walk me through the steps of upgrading to Thunderbird 3.0....as it is not included in the Ubuntu Software Center or Synaptic.   Thank you.....
download the .tar.gz from the website (UNLESS there is a .deb), make, make install
scratch that, it runs straight off after extraction
you should be able to either update ("sudo update-manager") or "sudo apt-get install thunderbird"
